snippet: Frederik Harhoff of Denmark, a judge at the United Nations war crimes tribunal, suggested that the court’s president, an American, pressured judges in recent verdicts.
lead_paragraph: Frederik Harhoff of Denmark, a judge at the United Nations war crimes tribunal, suggested that the court’s president, an American, pressured judges in recent verdicts.
